#### ii) Font problem!!! Solution (by Annrose):

```
# install.packages(devtools)
library(devtools)
library(extrafont)
font_import()
loadfonts(device = "win")
loadfonts()
fonts()
```
It has enabled you to register several fonts to my Windows and isÂ now working
